text: Golden Road is the third studio album by Australian country music singer Keith Urban. It was released on October 8, 2002. The producers of the album were Dan Huff and Keith Urban. The album stayed on the Billboard Hot Country Albums chart for 108 weeks peaking at #2 and peaked #11 on the Billboard 200. The album reached double Platinum in Canada selling 200,000 units. == Singles from Golden Road == *2002 - "Somebody Like You" *2002 - "Raining on Sunday" *2003 - "Who Wouldn't Wanna Be Me" *2004 - "You'll Think of Me" Category:2002 albums Category:Keith Urban albums
title: Golden Road (album)
